short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring a nostalgic touch to your new tab with the Hello Kitty Pixel Art Live Wallpaper!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Featuring Hello Kitty in a pixelated design, this extension adds a fun, retro vibe to your browsing experience. Easily access your favorite websites with popular shortcuts, personalize with custom links, and stay organized with the built-in calendar and clock. Search the web effortlessly with your default search engine.
